overview:
## Discussion

In export-only mode, HPKE negotiates key derivation, but you can’t use it to encrypt or decrypt data.

# HPKE.AEAD.exportOnly

**Case**

An export-only mode.

## Declaration

```swift
case exportOnly
```

## Discussion

In export-only mode, HPKE negotiates key derivation, but you can’t use it to encrypt or decrypt data.
title: HPKE.AEAD.exportOnly
